group_1.textCenter: Ahaha! Sorry for the delay, but the party's@about to begin!

group_1.narration: Much to my surprise, Hanna had enthralled@quite a few Witches and kept them close.
I mentioned they seemed like pets,@and she said, "Yeeep, that's just what they are!"
But she hadn't just done it for sport.@She was biding her time for the right opportunity…
Where she could unleash them in the middle@of town to wreak havoc.

group_1.textCenter: Nothing like spreadin' disasters all over town!@Oh what on earth could happen next?

group_1.narration: Hanna implanted a detailed series@of suggestions into each Witch and had them@carry them out step by step.
It led to all kinds of problems all over the city,
bringing ruin to the day-to-day lives@that so many people were thankful for…

group_1.textRight: Hey, Sena, you wanna give it a try, too?

group_1.textLeft: …Ah, I'm afraid I don't have my suggestion@magic anymore…

group_1.textRight: Ahh, I see... Makes sense…

group_1.textLeft: …Erm…
I have an idea! Why don't we use our Witches@to take care of the Magical Girls?

group_1.textRight: What d'you mean?

group_1.textLeft: Well, wherever there are Witches, Magical Girls@show up to defeat them.

group_1.textRight: Right, right…@So you wanna get the jump on ‘em?

group_1.textLeft: No, not that… It's more like…

group_1.narration: "Why don't we use Witches to make@Magical Girls fight each other?"

group_1.textRight: Hm?!

group_1.textLeft: When things get really bad,
people put themselves first and shove everyone@else aside, right?
If we take advantage of that mindset,@Magical Girls will turn on each other,
and maybe they won't focus on Witches@as much.

group_1.textRight: Ahaha…So you're saying we should also mess@with the Magical Girl system while we're at it?
You're a genius, Sena! I never would've come@up with that!

group_1.textLeft: Well, I mean…

group_1.narration: I think I only thought of it because@of the influence from my Witch…

group_1.textRight: Hm? What's wrong?@You went all quiet.

group_1.textLeft: Uh? Um, never mind that. I just wanted@to know… Was I useful?

group_1.textRight: Useful…? Ahh, so that's what this is about…
Look, I don't think you're useless even if you@can't use suggestion anymore.
Well, I guess it's more like, it's okay even if you@really are useless! 'Cause you're my friend. [a]

group_1.textLeft: Y-yeah...
(I was kind of hoping you'd say I was useful...)

group_1.textRight: Stiiill…I wonder if I can really get a Witch@to do all that…

group_1.textLeft: Erm, you don't think it'll work?

group_1.textRight: It's more like, maybe we gotta put in some work@ourselves, instead of just leavin' it all to them…

group_1.textLeft: You have a plan?

group_1.textRight: Sure do! We can't have anyone gettin'@in our way…
So we're gonna have lots and looots of fun!

group_1.narration: And so we went over to the riverbed...@where the Magical Girl we were looking@for sometimes passes by.

group_1.textLeft: Say, what kind of person is she?

group_1.textRight: …Restless. She's always on the move.
But I just know she's gonna react exactly how@we need her to!

group_1.textLeft: Hmph… It sounds like you like her.

group_1.textRight: Huh…? What makes you say that?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, someone's here…is that her?

group_1.textRight: Yeah…yeah, that's her, but…
…Whatever! We gotta hide!
Mm… Yeah, no dice…

group_1.textLeft: Is she a Magical Girl?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, Nanaka Tokiwa…@She's a funny chick.

group_1.textLeft: *Grumble* *Grumble*

group_1.textRight: …The heck? Uh, are you mad?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, it's nothing... But what will you do now@that she's gone?

group_1.textRight: Go after her, of course.
